channel.title: Lottery chest
channel.description: hey im on delta and i need to make it so when i click my chest there is an option saying ( pay 50k ) or ( no its to much ) and whne u click 50k its aa random number that is like a lotery chest and when if you win u get like a prize cash

item.title: Lottery chest
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Dell:

its client sided, that should start you off.

Are you high? That post didn’t help at all, and is wrong.

@OP: Private message me and I’ll spoonfeed something up for you, unless you want to do it yourself, I’ll tell you the classes you will have to edit, and the steps on how to get this working.

  1. You would have to make it so a Frame pops up whenever you click it so, you would need Client.java, in you object clicking packet.

  2. You would have to make the frame options work, which is in Clickingmost.java

  3. You would have to make it so it generates a random number, and then if the number is a certain number you win a prize, otherwise nothing happens.

It’s really easy, just Pm me if you need any help.

Read full topic
